transArray.content: The rooms in this hotel are very clean. There is a robot that delivers groceries, which is very convenient. You can wash clothes, and the breakfast is very rich. The anti-epidemic measures are very good. You need to take your temperature and scan the health code when entering. It is very safe.

Dear guest, thank you for staying at Beijing Chaoyang Park Qiaodong Branch and giving us a favorable review. The hotel belongs to the Hanting 2.7 version. The products are very new and clean. The breakfast is a buffet with rich and delicious styles. There is also a free parking lot and laundry room. We hope that This hotel can become your first choice in Beijing and we sincerely look forward to your visit again!
